references.paper_title: Imagenet classification with deep convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work on deep convolutional neural networks for image classification, which significantly advanced the field of computer vision.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of residual learning, enabling the training of very deep neural networks and achieving state-of-the-art results on image recognition tasks.
This paper introduced the Transformer architecture, which relies solely on attention mechanisms and has revolutionized natural language processing and other fields.
This paper provides a comprehensive overview of deep learning, summarizing the key concepts, architectures, and applications of this rapidly growing field.
It provides a comprehensive overview of transfer learning techniques and methodologies.
